Manage your education and skills funding prototype Component library

Components are reusable parts of the user interface that have been used in the design of the MYESF service, sub services and features.

All of the listed components are made up from the GOV.UK Design System styles, patterns and components. It is also based on the GOV.UK elements design components.

Related GOV.UK resources

  • GOV.UK Design System
  • GOV.UK elements
  • Government Design Principles
  • Service Design Manual
  • Style guide
